DESCRIPTION: Cards that are not native to #yThe #yUma, such as cards from other characters, colorless cards, statuses, or curses.

Your current #yMood affects outgoing damage and Energy gain on turn start. At #bAwful #ymood [REMOVE_SPACE], gain #b1 less Energy. At #bGreat #ymood [REMOVE_SPACE], gain #b1 more Energy. If you end combat at #bAwful mood, there is a #b1 in #b4 chance a random #yCurse is added to your deck.
This effect will activate if your #yMood is negative. ( [REMOVE_SPACE]#bBad or #bAwful [REMOVE_SPACE])
This effect will activate if your #yMood is positive. ( [REMOVE_SPACE]#bGood or #bGreat [REMOVE_SPACE])
Block will not be removed at the start of your turn.
